name: EQUIPOS MÓVILES DE CAMPAÑA ARPA SAU
goal: Design, manufacture, supply and maintenance for both civil and defence sectors of: Containers, Trailers and Portable Equipment of: Food Services, Hygiene, Infrastructures, Barracks and Field Camp, Medical use, Transport, Storage and Maintenance, Field Kitchens, Mimetic Nets, Gun Racks, Hangars and Field Tents, Field Hospital, Mobile Units of Command and Control and Logistics, HVAC, Supply of Camp and Barracks, Medical Equipment and Spare Parts related with all the above mentioned products.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Customs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Aid & Crisis Management
Refugees Management
Social Housing
Health Care Prevention Programmes
Schooling
Renovable energies
Water cycle
